title: Requires new school buses with eight or more passenger capacity to be equipped with engine fire suppression systems
summary: Requires school buses having a seating capacity in excess of fifteen passengers, purchased after September 1, 2013, to be equipped with engine fire suppression systems; require state education transportation aid to cover costs of purchase by school districts of school bus engine fire suppression systems.
